p: Besides, consumption of milk or dairy products (cheese, butter…) is correlated with a reduced risk of numerous types of cancer ( Jeyaraman et al., 2019). These properties are attributed to the variety of components such as fat compounds, conjugated linoleic acid, and proteins such as casein and vitamins (A, B, C, D) which have been proved to have protective and/or anticarcinogenic properties ( Davoodi et al., 2013). The use of camel urine by Muslims comes from the fact that prophet of Islam Mohamad ‘Peace Be Upon Him’ advised its use in the treatment of various ailments ( Alebie et al., 2017).
